name: Amazing Dance Star
description:
The inspiration for this game:

Currently features:

  • playing listed songs off youtube to dance to
  • pose estimation in real time so you can play any song, not just prerecorded songs
    • CAVEATS: 
      • if the clothes are too similar in color to the background pose estimation will go wild. 
      • pick a song that has one camera angle only with a full-body view. 
      • If you want to search for more songs try, "SONGNAME dance cover". People work as well as MMDs. 
      • Currently only allows one person in the dance, multiple people will make pose estimation freak out.
  • adding youtube song to your songlist
  • removing youtube song from your songlist

HOW TO PLAY VIDEO FROM SONGLIST:

Select song, wait for song to start then press play song on bottom right. Then in the 2nd screen you press play on the bottom left. If it doesn't work, go back and retry.

IDEALLY:

This should be played on a laptop that has a webcam and hooked up to a TV or large monitor with a cable. If you have no cable, you can still cast to your TV, but there will be a .3 second delay. Also, make sure the camera sees at least slightly below your knees. For desktop, you need a webcam. Also remember to clear your play area because you will move a lot. Please don't smack your hands on the wall or stub your toes.

If you want to check how you're graded, you can check the imagedata folder created wherever Amazing Dance Star is extracted to. 90% of the time you're the one making the mistake, 10% of the time it's the pose estimation. Also, still a WIP. It's a miracle it even works on mmds at all. 

If you want to add a song, make sure it keeps once camera angle. The program will work but you may be forced to twist your body to fit that camera angle. At least with a single camera angle the body motions are required to be at semi-human.

if you want to record for youtube/social media currently you need editing skills and the best setup probably would be to still stitch together the video recording of you and the actual video in your favorite video editor.

please donate so that I can finish off this TODO list:

  • add multi person tracking (for songs and for group playing; think kpop or backup dancers with friends)

  • hire artists so the game looks nice
  • have bug reporting so that I can fix the pose estimation/train it better

What you should do:

  • playtest
  • share with ur friends, streamers, mmd creators
  • STRETCH BEFORE DANCING PLEASE
  • CHECK YOUR PLAY AREA SO YOU DONT HIT ANYTHING
  • have fun

KNOWN BUGS

  • sometimes song would not load properly, to fix just go back to song selection and retry
  • score disappears at the end of a song (I should only reset score when playing new song not at the end of a song)
  • stutter @ the end of video playback (it's an ffpyplayer problem)
  • i don't print out all of the images for some reason in imagedata
  • if colors are too similar (for example clothes and a background), the pose estimate will go wild and off mark.
